name: AssessmentUsingAnInstrumentForAssessingCognitiveFunctionInParkinsonsDiseaseSNOMED
title: Assessment Using an Instrument for Assessing Cognitive Function in Parkinson's Disease  (SNOMED)
description: This value set includes SNOMED concepts for assessment procedures performed using a validated instrument for assessing cognitive function in PD.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes SNOMED concepts for assessment procedures performed using a validated instrument for assessing cognitive function in PD.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify the patients who were assessed using a validated cognitive assessment. This element may map to the "Diagnostic Study" category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts for assessment procedures using a validated instrument for assessing cognitive function in PD.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts for instruments used for assessment of cognitive function, i.e., concepts for the instrument itself. Excludes concepts for procedures performed using the assessment instruments.)

concept.display: Assessment using Modified Mini-Mental State Examination (procedure)

contains.display: Assessment using Modified Mini-Mental State Examination (procedure)
